Name: Morkredd
About the game: The Orb is your fate... The Orb Calls for Two Morkredd is best played as a couch co-op experience. Heed the Orb’s call with a friend or prove your loyalty alone by mastering the unique dual-character controls. Your Path is the Orb You are the Orb’s protector, and the Orb’s light is yours. Survive and master over 60 puzzles while avoiding the shadows caused by your partner and the environment. The Orb is Your Only Friend An endless abyss of deadly shadows conceal dangers in this cold, dark world. Stay with the Orb if you want to stay alive. Gaze into the Orb Discover ancient secrets about the Orb hidden in the darkness.
Meta Title: Morkredd: Dec 10, 2020, Hyper Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Morkredd? Check out the release date (Dec 10, 2020), developer insights from Hyper Games, and a complete game summary.
